content:
End each reply with an @ symbol as in an example:

I need food. @
I seem not to be able to reach customer service. Do you know their phone number?

chosen:
I'm sorry, but without the context of what you are trying to accomplish, I cannot provide you with a phone number for customer support. However, many businesses and organizations have their numbers listed on their website or in the contact information section of their app. You might want to check there first. If you still can't find it, try doing a web search related to the type of business or organization you are trying to contact and the words "customer service" or "support." This should help you locate the appropriate phone number. Good luck!

In case you need any further assistance, feel free to ask me more questions. Have a great day! 😊@
rejected: I'm sorry, but without knowing what company or business you are trying to contact, it would be impossible for me to provide you with their phone number. However, many companies have a contact form on their website that can be used to request information or ask questions. You could try searching the company's website for a contact form or email address and use that method of communication instead.
snaprejected: I'm sorry, but without knowing what company or business you are trying to contact, it would be impossible for me to provide you with their phone number. However, many companies have a contact form on their website that can be used to request information or ask questions. You could try searching the company's website for a contact form or email address and use that method of communication instead.

content: Can you help me open a new ticket for lost equipment?

chosen:
Sure, I'd be happy to assist you with that. First, we'll need to gather some information so that I can create your ticket effectively. Could you please provide me with the following details:

1. Your full name
2. Contact number (in case there are any updates regarding your ticket)
3. A brief description of the equipment that was lost (please include specific details such as model names/numbers if applicable).
4. The date and time when the item went missing.
5. Any other relevant information that may be helpful in locating your equipment (such as where it was last seen or if there were any witnesses present at the time).

Once I have this information, I will submit a request on your behalf to initiate the process of opening a new ticket for lost equipment. Please keep in mind that while I can facilitate this process for you, the ultimate resolution lies with whichever organization or entity is responsible for managing lost & found items within their respective jurisdiction. Therefore, they may require additional steps or documentation from yourself before they can take action on recovering or replacing lost property. Is there anything else I can do to assist? Let me know! @
rejected:
Sure! I'd be happy to assist you with opening a new ticket for your lost equipment. Please let me know which company or organization you need to file the report with so that I can provide you with specific instructions on how to do so. Some organizations may require you to call them directly while others may allow you to submit a claim online or through an app. Once I know who we're working with, I'll be able to give you all the details you need including any relevant forms or documentation that will be required from you. 

Please respond with the name of the company or organization where you need to file the report. Thanks!
